movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.review: Avengers: Endgame is an epic and emotional journey where superheroes unite for one final battle to save the universe and reverse the past.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
movies.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Science Fiction, Superhero
movies.review: Spider-Man: Far From Home is a fun and action-packed adventure where Peter Parker takes on new challenges while trying to balance being a teenager and a superhero during a school trip to Europe.

movies.title: Your Name
movies.review: Your Name is a stunning and emotional anime about two strangers connected through body-swapping, love, and destiny.

movies.title: Chennai Express
movies.review: A man travelling to Rameswaram via Chennai express for his late grandfather's ashes immersion finds himself in trouble after helping a don's daughter and her cousins board the train.

movies.title: Crayon Shinchan Super Dimension the Storm Called My Bride
movies.review: Shinchan Nohara sends a girl named Tamiko on a mission to bring his five-year-old self to that time period right before being captured. Reaching the past, she claims to be Shinchan's bride and takes him and his friends on a wild adventure to try to save the world to come.
